org.buildmlearn.appstore.activities

Class FlashActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.support.v4.app.TaskStackBuilder.SupportParentable, android.support.v7.app.ActionBarDrawerToggle.DelegateProvider, android.support.v7.app.AppCompatCallback, android.view.animation.Animation.AnimationListener, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback, android.view.Window.OnWindowDismissedCallback

    public class FlashActivity
extends android.support.v7.app.AppCompatActivity
implements android.view.animation.Animation.AnimationListener
    This activity deals with the Flash Card apps. Any Flash card app is launched using this activity. It renders XML to show cards in the particular app.

      • onAnimationEnd

        public void onAnimationEnd(android.view.animation.Animation animation)
        This method is called when the animation ends. It sets the state of the card, whether it is flipped or not.
        Specified by:
        onAnimationEnd in interface android.view.animation.Animation.AnimationListener
        Parameters:
        animation - Animation Object
